events.message: I received the wrong product in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because it is not what I paid for.
The case has been classified under the Refund cluster based on the customer's request for money back due to receiving an incorrect item.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request to ensure the customer's issue is addressed promptly.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong product. I'll be happy to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product you received? This will help us process your refund quickly.
Here is my order number 1234567 and the attached photos showing the item I got, which is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated your refund, and you should receive the money back in 5-7 business days. You do not need to return the incorrect item.
Thanks for the quick response and for not requiring me to return the wrong product. I appreciate your help resolving this.
The refund process has been completed on our side. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund. Please feel free to reach out if you have further questions.
Since your refund has been processed and there are no further issues reported, this case will now be closed. Thank you for contacting us.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to help us improve our service. We would appreciate your feedback when you have a moment.
